page.title: 11VILLAGE LIFE
page.content: If one is willing to participate in village life,( see text 7) life can be busy and active. A good community spirit here. Large proportion of residents over 60's,mainly retired business people, friendly,a good social mix,a relaxed pace of life. Very little crime. Disadvantages - Large section of the community is ageing. People with no car face a long journey for hospital appointments or visits. No doctor, no school,no police in village, buses infrequent. Young people have to move away for work & houses. More Council Houses needed to provide influx of younger people as houses here too expensive for 1st time buyers.
